pages.title: Starmetal
pages.text: Starmetal is a foundational material for many magical components.

Starmetal ore should generate deep underground. Due to a number of $(t:The mod author couldn't work out how to add it to world generation)interesting magical confluxes$(t), it does not. However, it can be created from iron ore via a simple process involving the sheer force of will of the creator.$(br2)It may be smelted into ingots like all other ore.
This process is temporary, and the changes in magical energies may alter this process in the future.
